title: Regression on HEAD branch are failing with exception during xpath/xqts  test suite on several machines.
description:
Regression is failing on following machine during xpath and xqts test suite. The machines throw an exception (see below example) and after it gets killed. It is intermittent, but very frequent on sandbox and other machines.


Machine : rh5-intel64-70-sbox-2
Path to log :  /space/builder/builds/linux64/HEAD/logs.20130128.1

Machine : rh6-intel64-70-test-2
Path to log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/HEAD/logs.20130128.0/reg-results/

Machine name : rh5-intel64-70-build
Path to log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/HEAD/logs.20130128.1/reg-results


Example xpath
:
Machine name : rh5-intel64-70-sbox-2
Path to log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/HEAD/logs.20130128.1
xpath-setup-db.xml : Passed
Mon Jan 28 14:22:14 PST 2013: creating threads...
Mon Jan 28 14:22:14 PST 2013: starting...
Mon Jan 28 14:22:23 PST 2013: Reporting results...
Mon Jan 28 14:22:23 PST 2013: Writing results to /space/builder/builds/linux64/HEAD/qa/scripts/results/xpath_parent_fragment_setup.xml
xpath_parent_fragment_setup.xml : Passed
Mon Jan 28 14:22:23 PST 2013: creating threads...
Mon Jan 28 14:22:23 PST 2013: starting...
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.LinkedHashMap$LinkedHashIterator.nextEntry(LinkedHashMap.java:390)
        at java.util.LinkedHashMap$ValueIterator.next(LinkedHashMap.java:405)
        at com.marklogic.xcc.ContentSourceFactory$ConnectionCollector.run(ContentSourceFactory.java:462)
com.marklogic.performance.SamplerException: java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
        at com.marklogic.performance.XCCSampler.sample(XCCSampler.java:162)
        at com.marklogic.performance.Sampler.run(Sampler.java:104)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:679)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalThreadStateException
        at java.lang.Thread.start(Thread.java:655)
        at com.marklogic.xcc.ContentSourceFactory$ConnectionCollector.checkAlive(ContentSourceFactory.java:477)
        at com.marklogic.xcc.ContentSourceFactory.defaultConnectionProvider(ContentSourceFactory.java:350)
        at com.marklogic.xcc.ContentSourceFactory.newContentSource(ContentSourceFactory.java:220)
        at com.marklogic.xcc.ContentSourceFactory.newContentSource(ContentSourceFactory.java:244)
        at com.marklogic.xcc.ContentSourceFactory.newContentSource(ContentSourceFactory.java:263)
        at com.marklogic.performance.XCCSampler.sample(XCCSampler.java:156)
        ... 2 more

Path to log : /space/builder/builds/linux64/HEAD/logs.20130128.1/reg-results

changeHistory.comment: Moving this to Sumit's queue..since he filed it.
